message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $11000 is a little low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $12000. This would still be a great deal for you, as you've indicated the product is worth $15000 to you. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11500?
